infoBusiness.title: Business Information
infoBusiness.shortDes: The business information is displayed on the page for the students to read the information, please fill in carefully.

placeholder.businessName: The name displayed for the students within 20 letters
placeholder.shortDes: The introduction displayed for the students within 80 letters
placeholder.introduction: Please fill in the introduction within 80 letters
placeholder.emailCodeInput: Please fill in the verification code
placeholder.emailCode: Please fill in the verification code

rules.introductionEmpty: Please fill in the introduction in a word

status.auditPassed: Congratulations,!You have been audited by the platform。
status.auditing: Hello, we have received your application for admission and will complete the audit within 1-2 working days.
status.auditNotPassed: Sorry.You have not reached the standard of this platform

text.checkboxLabel: I have read and agree to the agreement
text.limitType: Supports JPG, GIF, PNG, or BMP images
text.limitImg: Please upload your own clear head image
text.limitIdentify: 请保证身份证姓名，身份证号码清晰可见
text.limitOrgin: 请保证签发机关、有效期限清晰可见
text.limitPassport: 请保证护照姓名，护照号码清晰可见
text.tipDownload: 请填写完本页信息后，点击下载
text.uploadScanning: 上传亲笔签名后的扫描件
text.teacherCertificateLimit: 请提交有效期内的教师资格证照片，需确保头像和文字清晰
text.academicLimit: 请提交大学本科以上学历水平证件照片，如学生证、毕业证等（需包含照片、姓名、专业、官方印章等有效信息）
text.professionCertificateLimit: 请提交教学能力或专业能力证明，如职称证书、考级证书等（需包含官方印章等有效信息）
text.otherCertificate: 请提交其他证明您教学水平的证明

tip.certificate: 如：音乐教师资格证。(10字以内，会标注在老师主页)
tip.diploma: 如：绘画艺术硕士学位。（10字内，会标注在老师主页）
tip.professionalCertificate: 如：民乐琵琶演奏十级。（10字内，会标注在老师主页）
tip.others: 如：专职讲师聘书。（10字内，会标注在老师主页）
tip.backEdit: Back to last step to modify the information
